name: Light of Coco
description:
Help Coco the cat illuminate his path in a world filled with darkness. Stay close to candles so your light doesn't burn out.

Developed in 48 hours for Game Jam Aotearoa 2021. The given theme was "light and dark". This is what we came up with. Hope you enjoy!

Controls:
WASD to move
Space to jump
Mouse to move camera (Q/E for keyboard-only)

Credits:
Norbert Staskevicius
Mason Baxter
John Kim

Big thank you to all the organizers and sponsors who helped this event take place!
